1. In FY22, we enhanced our KPI approach was enhanced to incorporate multiple attributes of the W&L experience.
2. Our W&L tenant satisfaction survey was deferred in FY20 due to the sector disruption caused by COVID-19.
3. In FY22 we re-classified tenant satisfaction percentages as results with a score of 7-10 (as opposed to 6-10) to better reflect overall satisfaction.
4. The FY21 satisfaction score reported in prior years (6-10 score) was 87%.
5. The FY19 satisfaction score reported in prior years (6-10 score) was 83%.
6. The FY18 satisfaction score reported in prior years (6-10 score) was 89%.
7. In FY21, we enhanced the KPI approach to incorporate multiple attributes of the shopper experience.
